General.Name: Bohai Leasing Co Ltd
General.Description: Bohai Leasing Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a leasing company in the People's Republic of China. The company offers aircraft, containers, infrastructure and real estate, and high-end equipment leasing services. The company was formerly known as Bohai Capital Holding Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Bohai Leasing Co., Ltd. in November 2018. Bohai Leasing Co., Ltd. Was founded in 1993 and is based in Beijing, China.
